```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame({"key": [1, 1, 2], "a": [-1, 0, 1], 1: [10, 11, 12]})
>>> agg_a = pd.NamedAgg(column="a", aggfunc="min")
>>> agg_1 = pd.NamedAgg(column=1, aggfunc=lambda x: np.mean(x))
>>> df.groupby("key").agg(result_a=agg_a, result_1=agg_1)
 result_a  result_1
key
1          -1      10.5
2           1      12.0 
```
